comments: 2009-2010 Million Dollar Celebrity Invitational quarterfinal game 6.

clues.clue: Since Wisconsin is "America's Dairyland", this is its state beverage

final_jeopardy.clue: When he passed away in December 1980, flags in Kentucky flew at half-staff for 4 days
